transcript.text: chapter 14 returning home Norman
Oklahoma our next stop normally I would
have never considered preaching at the
University of Oklahoma because by the
time we left Alabama the school year was
practically over in fact the UFO was
already in its finals weeks which is
always a very difficult time of year to
draw a crowd due to the pressure of
exams on students however some friends
of the Arkansas congregation we visited
who also happened to attend Monta
Judah's messianic congregation invited
us to stay with them for a week free
food and lodging meant that yah
definitely wanted us on that University
driving up a long dusty road that led
onto a small farm we admired the quiet
beauty of rural Oklahoma our hosts an
elderly couple in their mid seventies
met us on their driveway as we made our
introductions and settle down for some
coffee in their modest living room the
husband began to share an insight that
still carries with me to this day Daniel
remember how the Messiah said that as
long as I remain with you the light is
with you however when I depart and the
darkness comes when no man can work I
nodded well think of Yahshua as the Sun
when he came the first time the Sun was
setting the light would be all the signs
and miracles he did and in the book of
Acts the Sun was continuing to set you
still have light signs and miracles as
that Sun is setting eventually the Sun
is completely set and all you are left
with his darkness and stars in the sky
which is why for the past two thousand
years you don't see the huge miracles
that were done back then but only here
and there do you see miracles just like
the stars dotting a black sky I lean
forward gripping my coffee cup
he continued now when the Messiah
returns it will be the Sun rising just
before the Sun rises you see the dawn
lighting up the eastern horizon again
filling the sky with light this will be
the mighty exploits that the Saints will
be doing just before his return Wow I
said sipping my coffee I've never heard
of put that way before our first couple
of days at the University of Oklahoma
were as I expected very difficult to
draw crowd one morning as we were
preparing to leave for the day I noticed
this huge poster on the wall of our
temporary bedroom it was a massive tree
that charter the Lost Tribes of Israel
however as I began to study the poster
more closely chill ran through my spine
I noticed that it seemed to say all
black people were not from the tribes
and considered Gentiles I stepped back
from the poster shook my head and
thought maybe I was misunderstanding
what was being shown however as I was
helping to load the boys in her van I
overheard hanukkah telling our host
about a young black student who had
shown a great deal of interest in the
Torah the wife smiled and said ah yes
even those types of people can come into
the faith onic and I exchanged a glance
with each other as we left the house I
poster in the bedroom we are staying in
makes a lot more sense now Annika said
as we buckled our children into the band
yeah I think they believe in some sort
of white British is realism we're only
white people can become genuine
Israelites I felt sickened it was bad
enough that some Nessie anak Jewish
congregations try to redirect the wall
of partition between Jew and Gentile by
treating them differently but this
seemed to be a new racial twist on the
whole concept it was definitely strange
fire but we'd have to endure it for a
few more days while we stayed with our
hosts as we began driving the dusty
roads out of the rule farmlands into
town at began wondering why yah had
brought us to this place we hadn't been
able to draw huge crowds our host
believe some very strange and
uncomfortable doctrine and this whole
week seemed to be a mistake as I began
to preach on our fourth day at the U of
O a small crowd of very vile heckler
surrounded me they were mocking almost
every scripture that came out of my
mouth so what messianic congregation do
you guys attend a loud whisper from
behind me surprise me standing in the
shadow of a grove of trees a young woman
named Kimberly was desperate to get my
attention but clearly intimidated by the
heckler surrounding me I stepped away
from the crowd and motion for my wife to
join us I've been convicted for several
months about keeping Torah and I
couldn't find a church anywhere that
actually did so she explained to us I
know I shouldn't eat certain foods but
I'm confused on what is acceptable eat
and what is not as she continued to
relate her story it became clear to
Annika myself that she was extremely
hungry for the truth we spent a couple
of hours just talking to her one on one
answering all of her questions and
giving her plenty of traps to think
about after she left I embraced my wife
with joy this whole week has been worked
at just to meet Kimberly to celebrate we
left that afternoon to eat at a local
sandwich
his clouds don't look friendly at all
Annika said dark yellow and brown slaps
covered the sky and all the wind had
died as we ate the lights went out
briefly just a few flickers of darkness
then everything returned to normal we
were too busy talking about Kimberly and
the wonderful day we had on campus to
notice anything else but the next
morning we discovered on the news that a
huge tornado had ripped through Oklahoma
City in fact it had passed so close to
the campus that the students have been
evacuated early as we drove back into
town the next day surveying the damage
that tornado had brought on various
businesses he were joyfully grateful
Yahweh had kept us completely safe to
the entire experience in fact it kept us
so saved that we weren't even aware what
had happened until the next day I will
always remember that incident is a
testimony to how yah protects his people
when they are doing his will being in
the center of his will means he will
shield his own even in the midst of the
storm on one of our last days in
Oklahoma monta Judah had invited onic
and myself to meet with in his office as
we walked through the glass doors and
onto the plush carpet of Monty's
ministry headquarters
couldn't help but feel impressed with
how successful his ministry bit surely
if anyone could encourage us Monta would
when we stepped into his office of open
shelves lined with books his broad
polished desk with mahogany textured
walls Monta greeted us he had a large
beard that tumbled down his chest and
spectacles on his nose that reflected
the light his voice a deep baritone is
both commanding and welcome so here you
guys want to join my congregation when
they started off the conversation I
exchanged a confused look with my wife
and we both shook our heads no no we're
just traveling through I realized
somehow the communication lines have
gotten crossed oh well what are you
doing I began to explain money exactly
what yaad calls to do the counting the
various campuses we've preached at and
the amazing ways of spirit so we're kind
of like missionaries for the Messianic
Jewish movement here in the United
States and Monta started us for
suspended moment a long beach silence
filled the room he sighed and shook his
head well i have to tell you as much as
i admire what you're doing there's no
way you can sustain this for more than
18 months veronica tightening and run
fielder sniffing next this was supposed
to be an encouraging eating lost on both
of us you have two little children my
wife expensively doing something like
that's just just not fact as Monta went
on and on about how this mission would
not work it became clear that he wanted
us to settle down in Oklahoma joining
his congregation rather than doing what
God called us to do this was not what we
needed here look we should probably be
going I said as he rose from our chairs
well now hold on there let me give you a
gift for your ministry monta said
cutting us a five-hundred-dollar check
as we left his office's carrying
armloads of his tape meant teachings I
was deeply disturbed I know I should
feel happy about this check at said
annika reclined into the van Monica nada
that she strapped her children into
their car seats I know what you mean
something very dark it weren't its way
to my heart perhaps it had started over
the past few weeks as I called mark back
at PSU and realized despite the
newsletters we were sending out to
almost a hundred people but not a single
dime of financial support it come in but
Montes talk i put a very despairing
thought into my mind maybe we weren't
doing with the odd calls to do after all
as we headed north we had planned to
stop at colorado state university in
fort collins colorado i had preached on
this campus a few years ago before i
became a messianic and knew this was
always a great place to gather a crowd
however when we arrived at CSU a
combination of whether finals weeks and
the growing doubt my heart cut our
mission short the second day we
appreciate CSU I had all my tracks
printed and set up in seven different
stacks in front of me as was my custom
but a violent gust of wind wound up
fleeting my tracks all across campus had
to spend a few hours just trying to
collect all the paper so the campus
wouldn't find me for trashing the quad
although we had some good one-on-ones
with various students on anxiety began
growing in my heart any donations and
all yet I asked mark over the phone no
nothing although i have sent out a third
newsletter as i shut up the phone i
realized that the five hundred dollars
Monty given us was pretty much all we
have to live on
other than credit cards our savings were
completely exhausted
I think we better get back to Portland
it's a lot of them but we're going to
stay here all week Mike reminded me i
know i know that's what we had planned
but we barely have any money left on i
want to make sure we can at least get
back home it became supremely ironic
though i had preached the multitudes the
torah am awards of yahshua i was
forgetting the very key phrase that
Yahshua had spoken to his disciples be
anxious for nothing there for ice and
you take no thought for your life what
you shall eat to what you shall drink
more yet for your body what you should
all put on is not the life more than
food and the body more than clothing
despite all the Yad done for us in our
journey worried thoughts about how he
provide for annika or two little ones
crowded everything else out then things
went from bad to worse when we arrived
back in Portland a friend of ours who
attended our messianic congregation
invited ins to stay within his house as
the familiar Northwest rain needed us
and we drew near our friend zone I began
to think that at least we would have a
place to stay I tried to get my feet on
the ground exhausted from hours of
driving we carry our children to the
door of a large two-story house
I thought this will be a good place to
recharge and we gather my thoughts when
our friend opened the door and welcome
to him I wanted to throw the house was a
trash dump you could barely see the
carpet through all the clothes
half-finished food certain jumping cat
people retained to the air the toilets
not been cleaned in months the place was
an absolute nightmare too exhausted to
complain who had to sleep that night I
remember blinking my eyes of the
darkness laying on bed despair filling
my heart why have I displeased you son
huh we have barely any money no
financial support and now we're stuck in
a place that hasn't been cleaned in
years what are you doing to us I drifted
off into a very uneasy sleep the next
morning the glare of day only made it
more apparent cool utterly filthy the
housewives that evening would be the
midweek service at a messianic
congregation
I'm gonna go tonight see if I can find
some hookers okay I'll stay here maybe
trying to work on cleaning some of this
math she sighed I could tell she was not
happy with our living situation that
evening many were joyfully surprised to
see that we'd return to portland one
person after another would shake my hand
and erase me Oh Daniel we got your
newsletters every time I read them I
just shouted enjoy Daniel thank you so
much for the newsletters what an amazing
testimony and another person wow that
was amazing what happened at UCLA and
another person incredible testimonies
Daniel dozens and dozens of people kept
telling me how encouraged and thrilled
they word are preaching exploits yet not
a single person had offered a dime of
financial support bitter thoughts begin
mixing with my anxiety I wanted to shout
out to many of these people well if you
were so blessed by all yah has done
through us why don't you help us out but
I kept quiet frustrated beyond belief I
met with the pastor in his office and
explained our dire financial situation
as he handed me a check for twenty-five
dollars he patted me on the back and
said Daniel I think maybe now the issue
is really going to start using you I
wanted to crumple up the check and throw
it in my pastors face this past room in
my love and trusted was basically
telling you that up until this point yah
had not used me at all as I drove back
to our home that night tears filled my
eyes I couldn't hear Yas voice and
everything seemed to be imploding around
me this was not the return home I'd
expected a few days later azonic and the
boys were seated around a dirt encrusted
dining room table eating from dishes
that had finally been washed after
months of
sitting in the sink I stared at my wife
frustration bitterness and growing
anxiety filled my heart yah must be
punishing me somehow for some reason
something I can't figure out suddenly
Annika burst into tears across the table
she didn't say anything she just cried
she didn't have to say anything this was
all wrong I reached over to hug her but
I was so lost on my own despair I don't
think I was able to offer the comfort
she needed over the coming weeks I tried
to figure out a business i could start i
found an online manual on how to start a
window cleaning business and I thought
that might be perfect for the coming
summer that's I tried to gather supplies
and figure out what to do the stinking
grime of the house was distracting me I
could did the best she could to try and
clean but it seemed to be a losing
battle our host was dealing with
problems of his own he had just been put
in jail because his ex-wife and lured
him into breaking the court order while
he was in jail I discovered NASA's
amounts of pornography on his computer
disgusted i told my wife what I had
found honey we have to get out of here
this place is a trash dump physically
and spiritually and I'm afraid our
children are going to get sick how are
we going to leave we have no money we'll
use our credit cards we can't stay here
the next day our host was released from
jail and returned home I confronted him
about the porn on his computer he hung
his head in shame
he's pray for me
as I prayed for him and his entire
situation involving his ex-wife a great
peace settled over me later that night
annika comment you know Daniel I think
he really appreciated you praying for
him
